alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Hall (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 5:21AM CDT until June 12 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BUFFALO AND SOUTHERN HALL COUNTIES... At 521 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Kearney to near Gibbon to near Prosser, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. These severe storms will be near... Shelton around 525 AM CDT. Wood River around 535 AM CDT. Alda around 545 AM CDT. Doniphan around 550 AM CDT. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 268 and 317. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
